echoconda: Getting Started

Author: Brian M. Schilder

Most recent update: Mar-03-2022

Source: vignettes/echoconda.Rmd
echoconda.Rmd
library(echoconda)

Build env from yaml 

env_name <- env_from_yaml(yaml_path = system.file(package = "echoconda", 
                                                  "conda/echoR.yml"))
## echoconda:: Conda already installed.
## echoconda:: Retrieving conda env name from yaml.
## echoconda:: Conda environment already exists: echoR
## Time difference of 0.3 secs

Activate conda env 

activate_env(conda_env = "echoR")
## echoconda:: Conda already installed.
## echoconda:: Active conda env: 'echoR'
## echoconda:: Requested conda_env is already active: 'echoR'
## echoconda:: Attempting to activate conda env: 'echoR'
## [1] "echoR"

Find package path 

tabix <- find_package(package = "tabix", conda_env = "echoR")
## echoconda:: Identified tabix executable in echoR env.
print(tabix)
## [1] "/github/home/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/echoR/bin/tabix"

Find python path 

python <- find_python_path(conda_env = "echoR")
print(python)
## [1] "/github/home/.local/share/r-miniconda/envs/echoR/bin/python"
